onboarding_step0_body: Arrr! Unustasis be an open-source app fer the unu Scooter Pro. Connect yer ship to get started, me heartie.
onboarding_step1_body: Make sure yer ship be turned on and stand next to it. Begin searchin' when ye be ready.
onboarding_step2_body: This could take a few seconds, me matey.
onboarding_step2_body_error: Make sure the ship be turned on and nearby, me heartie.
onboarding_step3_body: A ship with the address {address} be found and be ready to connect, me matey.
onboarding_step4_body: Ye should get a pairin' request in a second, so keep an eye on yer notifications. Ye can find the pairin' code on the ship display, arrr!
onboarding_step4_error: Connection failed, arrr! Make sure the ship be powered on and nearby, then try again.
onboarding_step5_body: Yer ship be connected and be ready to use. Enjoy yer ride, me heartie!
bluetooth_error_generic: Error durin' search or connect, arrr!
seat_alert_title: Arrr! The treasure chest be open!
seat_alert_body: Avast ye! Fer safety reasons, ye can't be lockin' the treasure chest while it be open, arrr!
state_name_off: Powered off, like a sunken ship
state_name_ready: Hoist the anchor! Ready to set sail
state_name_linking: Joinin' forces with the app, arrr!
state_desc_standby: Shhh! Yer ship be takin' a nap
state_desc_off: Yer ship be as dead as Davy Jones' locker
state_desc_parked: Yer ship be ready for adventure, like a loyal crewmate
state_desc_ready: Onward! Yer ship be sailin' the high seas!
state_desc_hibernating: Yer ship be restin' in a deep, deep slumber
state_desc_hibernating_imminent: Yer ship be driftin' into hibernation soon, give it a few minutes!
state_desc_unknown: Yer ship be lost at sea
state_desc_linking: Yer ship be joinin' forces with the app as we speak!
stats_nfc_instructions: Hold yer phone under the NFC tag on the bottom of the battery, arrr!
stats_nfc_notice: If you're having trouble, try moving your phone around a bit. It might also be that your phone's NFC antenna is too weak.
stats_location_disclaimer: This shows the last location where yer ship was last linked to yer phone. This ain't real-time trackin', so don't let yer ship get plundered!
settings_biometrics_description: Require yer fingerprint or face recognition to get on board
biometrics_message: Authenticate to access the app, ye scurvy dog.
biometrics_failed: Arrr! Authentication failed, walk the plank!
settings_auto_unlock_description: Automatically unlock yer ship when the app be open and the ship be right next to ye. Warning: Might slow down the connection to yer ship on iOS
settings_open_seat_on_unlock_description: Automatically open the treasure chest when unlockin' yer ship.
settings_hazard_locking_description: Automatically alert yer crew while boardin' or droppin' anchor.
forget_alert_body: Arrr! To board again, ye'll need to go though the setup process again, me heartie.
stats_no_location: Tap to view on treasure map
settings_report_description:
If the app doesn't work as expected, you can send a report to the developers.

The report will include error logs from the last few minutes, so please use this feature directly after the error occurs.
report_placeholder: Please describe the issue you're having, and how to reproduce it, above the line:
